pageContext.claim: “The Rio Grande area where I was yesterday, you just have to look at it to see how dangerous it is.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump visited McAllen, Tex., considered one of the safest cities in the United States. McAllen Mayor Jim Darling told USA Today the impression that the region is under siege is wrong, and the area saw far higher numbers of migrants coming across in 2014 than it has in recent months
